duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist departmental management in preparing monthly and annual financial and KPI reports with commentary for presentation to managers
Prepare annual budgets and provide financial data requested by operating departments for organization‐wide meetings
Gather and synthesize information from each operating department for reporting at the Board of Directors meeting
Input data related to inventory management and analyze general ledger activity for budget variances
Supervise accounts receivable and accounts payable ledgers for timeliness and accuracy
Serve as a liaison to external auditors and research accounting matters for compliance with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles
Maintain the Finance department’s filing requirements schedule and file necessary reports/returns and maintain all fixed asset files and related reporting requirements

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance (Master’s preferred)
